paper_title: Tautological integrals on Hilbert scheme of points II: Geometric subsets
abstract: We develop a formula for tautological integrals over geometric subsets of the Hilbert scheme of points on complex manifolds. As an illustration of the theory, we derive a new iterated residue formula for the number of nodal curves in sufficiently ample linear systems.
publication_venue: 47 pages. Preliminary version, comments are welcome. arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:2112.15502; text overlap with arXiv:1712.09270 by other authors
